name: Ceramic Shooter
description:
In Ceramic Shooter, the goal is to avoid shooting things. You must pilot a malfunctioning ship (with a constantly shooting cannon) through a civilian sector, where you must cause as little damage as possible. With seven bizarre, timed levels, each concluding with a boss "fight," many strategies must be employed in order to accomplish this deceptively simple goal.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move ship and navigate menus
SPACE: Pause the game
Esc: Quit level; quit game at title screen
ENTER: Select things in menus
